title: Our Team
description: Meet the members of the OneLiteFeather team behind our projects. Last update: May 24, 2025

ranks.name: Administration
ranks.description: Responsible for the management and financial direction of the platform.

rankExplanations.description: The administration consists of financial server owners and other members responsible for management and strategic direction.
The development leadership manages servers, supports new developers, and makes decisions about which technologies to implement based on expertise.
Builders work on villages, redstone circuits, and other projects to shape the game world.
Developers work on plugins, AI, RestApis, and other technical solutions for the server.
System integrators take care of server infrastructure, security, and automation (DevOps).
The marketing team creates content for social media to attract new players.
Writers create concepts for game modes and translate them into features for plugins that are implemented by developers.
Moderators support players, ensure rules are followed, and are direct contacts for issues related to the Minecraft server.
